website_summaries.verdict: A leave-in conditioner that's packed with antioxidants and argan oil to nourish and enhance curly hair during styling.
pros: A good choice for very curly or tightly coiled hair
Also works well on dry hair
cons: May be too heavy for thin, curly hair

customer_reviews.title: Watered down!
customer_reviews.text: If the back doesn’t say Keystone made please don’t buy! I ordered two jars and the formula was VERY watery! Had to throw them both away! Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Made me fall in love with my wash n gos. I use this along with eco styler gel for why wash n gos and it keeps the hair moisturized and shiny, And you don't need a lot a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: mrs. steward

customer_reviews.title: This gel is the best, especially for extremely dry w.
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite hair product. I’ve been using this gel for 15 plus years. I have extremely curly hair and it keeps my curls tight and manageable as well as a lot of moisture in my hair. I have not found any other product that works miracles on my hair . I Love it!
customer_reviews.author: QUYETSTORM

customer_reviews.title: So. . I'm not quite sure
customer_reviews.text: I have type 3A 3B hair and I was really hoping this would work for me but I don't like how it makes my hair feel. I might be putting this in the wrong, or using too much that's a possibility. The first time I used it my hair was a mass of curls, but it felt a little dry and scrunchie. The second time I used it it didn't do much and I used it on damp hair the second time. I guess I have to work with it a little bit more and see what works but I can definitely say for me it didn't add any moisture to my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy55

customer_reviews.title: The best gel every man should have ( smells good
customer_reviews.text: The best gel every man should have ( smells good, no flakes, not sticky , not hard ) I been using this gel for years. Shocked to see it has bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Robles

customer_reviews.title: Great definition
customer_reviews.text: Works well to define curls, keeps hair moisturized and manageable. This is used after washing hair.
customer_reviews.author: Qiana

customer_reviews.title: Staple in my hair regimen
customer_reviews.text: I love this gel. It is my staple for the summer, mixed with EcoStyler. Leaves my hair with the perfect moisturized hold. I have a mixture of 3C/4a hair. I occasionally wear the long aid by itself, however, (as with any gel) it can be a little gooey until it dries.
customer_reviews.author: texaspeaches

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am verrry disappointed with the packaging of my items, hence i am giving this a 1. One jar was found open, all the Gel spilled into the package creating a big mess. I live in the caribbean and do not have the leisure of replacing the jar without paying shipping and handling all over again so i am definitely not a happy camper. But i have used this gel time and time again and its just amazing !. No flakes, lots of moisture for my hair and it makes my hair super soft for days Would recommend anytime and everytime .
customer_reviews.author: Nature Isle Girl

customer_reviews.title: Maybe products like this should be in a bubble wrap
customer_reviews.text: I know the product works because I’ve used it before so I know it does work the product was just damage on delivery I don’t know so I was not pleased with that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell makes my 11 year old mixed hair curly. Will buy again. No flaking. Very good
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Product is affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Works well in your hair. Leaving your full of sheen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on curly hair
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my hair - mostly curly. Can no longer find it in local stores so I’m happy to buy the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: love the smell of this it works great for my ...
customer_reviews.text: love the smell of this it works great for my well moisturized 4C hair to help with curl definition
customer_reviews.author: Kenesha

customer_reviews.title: Helps my hair keep moisture all day.
customer_reviews.text: Used it to keep moisture in my hair for a longer period of time. It can cause stickiness if you use too much. Follow usage instructions.
customer_reviews.author: ET47

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this purchase. I didn't know what to expect but after trying this product I don't think I will try anything else. I use it on my son's hair & his curls look & feel shiny & moisturized. I will definitely continue to purchase this Activator.
customer_reviews.author: So Lo

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair hydrated
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our daughter's normally dry hair and it has helped her hair stay hydrated and soft!! This will remain in our hair supply arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Toobs

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years my hair is always moist without having to use a lot of it. My natural curls stay hydrated all day and night I never have to over use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Softens but doesn't activate my curls....3 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Softens my hair but doesn't activate my curls as with my previous gel....for that l am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Joyeux

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I almost don’t want to tell others how good this product is. Moisturizing and not crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep moisture in your hair.
customer_reviews.text: My scalp drinks oil. Since using this produce, the moisture stays in my hair. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product has changed. It use to be a bit thicker, but is thinner and not as good.
customer_reviews.author: MomofOne2007

customer_reviews.title: Helped in keeping hair moisturized.
customer_reviews.text: This product helped in keeping my natural hair moisturized and my twist out defined.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Brown

customer_reviews.title: It's the only brand of product which works for him.
customer_reviews.text: The texture is not the same (it is not as thick).
customer_reviews.author: Buster John

customer_reviews.title: Had an Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had an allergic reaction to this product after using a small amount. Caused intense "stinging" across my entire scalp.
customer_reviews.author: TDM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Although I have used this product from a local store before, I was disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: CDPE

customer_reviews.title: A bit watery.
customer_reviews.text: Good. However feels a bit watery. Not as thick as I’m used to getting. Gets the job done however.
customer_reviews.author: Mayerling Tejada

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t consider this a gel
customer_reviews.text: It’s just okay... I have to put a ton of this product in my hair to get any hold at all which is disappointing. Not what I’m use to at all.
customer_reviews.author: cmc0427

customer_reviews.title: Not LIke The Product Received Before
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be a moisturizing gel for your hair and the gel was very thin & watery. I order this product all the time and I have never had this issue before.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Defective/Fake Product
customer_reviews.text: This product was extremely watered down. I didn't realize it until after the refund period and was refused refund. Had to purchase the real product at Walmart and have to unfortunately throw this one away. Very disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 BADLY... BROKEN TOPS GEL... WAS EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: Love the gel... 2 of my tops on the jars, were broken.. To the point where... The gel was all over... my other items...
customer_reviews.author: teresa......

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN JAR
customer_reviews.text: The jar is broken, the gel has fallen into the plastic. A REAL MESS. Disrespectful
customer_reviews.author: Nathie

customer_reviews.title: Serves me well!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and am very satisfied. I used to buy it from walmart who no longer sells it. I am happy I can get through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiser Ford

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but wish it was available in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Roshenia S. Johnson-Haley

customer_reviews.title: My hair acts very well to this produce. Will definitely order more before it runs out.
customer_reviews.text: Very good produce. I use it on my hair whether its wet or dry hair.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Moses

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very good product I will reorder again in the future
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Wright

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME PRODUCT-i searched many places for this Gel should have checked Amazon first.
customer_reviews.author: C J B C

customer_reviews.title: Great Gel for Naturals!
customer_reviews.text: Love the miniaturization properties of this gel. It really makes my natural curls pop!
customer_reviews.author: Teneil E

customer_reviews.title: Great gel, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Gel is excellent. Packaging is very poor, and a significant amount of gel had spilled by the time of delivery, making it an inappropriate item for online purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James O.

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the facts it brings the curls instantly . I simply like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Is very good , love it and don't have alcohol
customer_reviews.author: lindsay guzman valverde

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff. all the curls and none of the hardness
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: I was not happy with the contents of this product
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with the contents of this product. I've used it for some number of years and felt as if the product I was sold was inferior!!!
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend for moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This gel is one of the most moisturizing products I have, better than conditioners. I use it as a winter time leave in conditioner and curl enhancer, unfortunately not curl definer. It has somewhat of a watery texture and it even takes my hair much longer than usual to dry. But it only gives mild curl definition which disappears after a day or two and pretty much no hold. My hair is 4b, 4c (I think) low porosity. The picture in purple is with this gel and the picture in red is with my go to curl definer
customer_reviews.author: paola kamga

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately shipping took longer than expected, however I am so happy I finally received it! More thankful that it didn't arrive broken. I have been using this product since I was little and it made my hair grow AND kept it moisturized as my hair can get very dry. So glad I found it! Hopefully it does wonders like it used to
customer_reviews.author: J.M

customer_reviews.title: My favorite. Works well for Type 4 natural hair
customer_reviews.text: My favorite. Works well for Type 4 natural hair, only product that I have found that gives me some definition.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Georgia

customer_reviews.title: THE best
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps my hair moisturized and feeling good. I’m able to have length retention with my natural hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Radford

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have natural hair, this product is so moisturizing. It keeps my hair soft and manageable. I will definitely purchase this item over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: TRACY A.K.W. ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: Old School Still Works Today!
customer_reviews.text: My natural hair loves this product. Tried many other creams & gels, but still come back to this. Especially the dry hair formula.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley W.

customer_reviews.title: This is all I used in my 4a hair in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is all I used in my 4a hair in the summer time. It keeps my curls all day every day. Very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Best hair gel I've ever used. Leaves hair dry to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product.....
customer_reviews.text: It is like the original I have used for years......
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Best gel ever
customer_reviews.text: Best gel ever - keep my hair moist and shiny
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone James

customer_reviews.title: Great for wash and go
customer_reviews.text: Great for curl definition and elongation. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This product is fabulous as usual. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds the curl pattern with a sticky sweet smell.
customer_reviews.text: It gets the moisture back in your hair. Holds the curl pattern with a sticky sweet smell.
customer_reviews.author: Yes we can

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: No harsh ingredients!!! I love, love, love this product for my daughters natural hair.
customer_reviews.author: Babej's mummy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years! And it is still excellent, even though the price has increased significantly!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!!
customer_reviews.text: I am African American with low porosity, highly dense, thick, 3C curls. Being low porosity, finding a good moisturizer has proven difficult. This is one of the first products that both moisturized my hair and didn't irritate my scalp! It is a gel for styling but I use it as a moisturizer and my hair has changed from being dry and hard to silky soft and moisturized!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but on my edges it worked great.. not to slick them but to make ...
customer_reviews.text: thought i could do a wash and go on my 4c hair without the crunch of eco styler ...it moisturized the heck out of my hair and made my coild pop... side note my hair was so tacky and in 3 days my hair had little whit balls in it ..but on my edges it worked great .. not to slick them but to make them look moisturized
customer_reviews.author: Nappychick

product_meta.title: Long Aid Extra Dry Hair Activator Gel, 32 Oz
product_meta.description: Long Aid Extra Dry hair activator gel, boost your hair's volume with Long Aid Curl Activator gel and put life back into thirsty, dry, lifeless curls. Enriched with aloe Vera, protein and Vitamin B complex, it restores moisture to excessively dry hair, Controls frizz and helps to define your natural curls. Great for natural hair and textured styles, This formula helps to give your hair a clean, healthier shine with long lasting hold.
feature_bullets: The package dimension of the product is 6"L x 5.6"W x 5"H
